brand_name.rationale: Direct, professional, and descriptive. Immediately communicates purpose to target audience. No gimmicky or spooky naming.
brand_name.trademark_considerations: Generic descriptive term, low trademark risk

brand_positioning.value_proposition: Professional-grade EVP investigation tools in your pocket
brand_positioning.differentiation_strategy: Field equipment credibility in a market of novelty apps
brand_positioning.target_audience_alignment: Serious investigators who want signal over noise
brand_positioning.competitive_distinction: No word generators, no fake sensors—real audio analysis

brand_personality.emotional_appeal: Empowers users to investigate with credibility

logo_concept.design_direction: Minimal waveform icon suggesting audio analysis
logo_concept.symbol_meaning: Stylized audio waveform representing EVP capture and analysis
logo_concept.scalability_considerations: Simple enough for small icons, recognizable at all sizes
logo_concept.platform_adaptations: Teal on dark for iOS, adaptive icon with teal foreground for Android

color_palette.color_strategy: Dark-first palette optimized for night use, with teal accent for professional technical feel

primary_typeface.rationale: Native platform fonts for performance and familiarity

typography.hierarchy_system: iOS HIG-based scale from caption to display

iconography_style.consistency_guidelines: All icons share grid, stroke weight, and corner radius

app_icon.concept: Stylized waveform on dark background with teal accent
app_icon.platform_variations: iOS: Full icon with background, Android: Adaptive with teal foreground

in_app_branding.header_treatment: App name in headline weight, teal accent on dark
in_app_branding.button_styling: Teal filled for primary, outlined for secondary
in_app_branding.card_design: Elevated dark surface (#161619) with subtle border

store_presence.app_store_presentation: Dark screenshots showing waveform and spectrogram
store_presence.screenshot_branding: Minimal frames, focus on app functionality

content_voice.writing_style: Technical but accessible, confident without being sensational

marketing_messages.app_store_description: Turn your phone into a professional EVP investigation tool. Record, analyze, and document your investigations with real audio analysis—not novelty gimmicks.
marketing_messages.social_media_voice: Share findings, discuss methodology, build community of serious investigators
marketing_messages.user_communication: Respectful, informative, supportive of investigative goals

color_usage_guidelines: Never use teal as large background
Recording red reserved for active recording only

accessibility_compliance.inclusive_language: Avoid assumptive language about paranormal beliefs

consistency_maintenance.update_procedures: Design token updates cascade to all components
consistency_maintenance.quality_control: Review against brand guidelines before release
